channel.title: Personal Growth on Dominic's Sandbox
channel.description: Recent content in Personal Growth on Dominic's Sandbox

item.title: Love Notes (and Bugs) in the Silence of Home
item.description: A love story told in the quiet moments of working from home together.

item.title: The Productivity Lie We All Believe (And Why I’m Ditching It)
item.description: Multitasking is a lie. Discover why single-tasking is the real productivity superpower and how it’s transforming my focus and life.

item.title: The Productivity Myth That’s Keeping You Stuck (And How to Escape It)
item.description: Productivity isn’t about doing more—it’s about doing what matters. Discover how to escape the productivity trap and find real progress.

item.title: I Never Thought I’d Grow a Beard
item.description: Growing a beard was never in my plans. But this accidental experiment taught me more about identity than I expected.

item.title: The Real Reason We Struggle to Change (And How to Fix It for Good)
item.description: Change isn't about willpower—it's about identity. Discover why habits fail and how shifting your identity leads to lasting change.

item.title: The Myth of Motivation (And What Actually Works Instead)
item.description: Motivation is a lie. Discover why waiting to feel inspired keeps you stuck and learn practical strategies to take action anyway.

item.title: Changing My Mind Doesn’t Make Me Weak—It Makes Me Smarter
item.description: Changing your mind isn’t a weakness—it’s growth. Discover why evolving your perspective makes you smarter and more adaptable.
